name: Girl Kill Zombies
description:
Girl Kill Zombies is a third-person shooter game. The girl wakes up and finds herself in a strange forest surrounded by zombies. Now take your weapon and start fighting!

Keyboard Tab: View the number of zombies killed
Keyboard G: Dancing
Keyboard M: Control music
Left mouse button + space key: Continuous attack

Zombie location:


(Bullets changed to 900 rounds)
Attacking zombies with swords requires movement and cannot stand.
